name: NOVA MARKETING SYSTEMS
slogan: Global training staffing sales & marketing enterprise

jobs.title: Admin Assistant
jobs.description:
**Job Description** 

Nova Marketing Systems LTD is a business to business lead generation and appointment setting enterprise. As an Admin Assistant; 

*   Answer and direct phone calls 
* You must produce and distribute correspondence memos, letters, faxes and forms 
*  Organize and schedule appointments 
*  Plan meetings and take detailed minutes 
*  Develop and maintain a filling systems 
*  Update and maintain office policies and procedures 
*  Book travel arrangements 
*  Order office supplies 
*  Generate reports 
 
**Required Skills**

* Minimum Education required: 3 A-Levels 
* Proven experience as an administrative assistant or office admin assistant 
* Working knowledge of office equipment, like printers and fax machines 
* Proficiency in MS Office (MS Excel and MS Powerpoint) 
* Excellent time management skills and the ability to prioritize work 
* Attention to detail and problem solving skills 
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills 
* Strong organizational skills iwth the ability to multi task 

**Desired Skills** 

* Other special requirements: CIPD Level 3

  • Update and maintain office policies and procedures
  • Book travel arrangements

  • Generate reports

  • Proven experience as an administrative assistant or office admin assistant
  • Working knowledge of office equipment, like printers and fax machines
  • Proficiency in MS Office (MS Excel and MS Powerpoint)
  • Excellent time management skills and the ability to prioritize work
  • Attention to detail and problem solving skills
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Strong organizational skills iwth the ability to multi task

Desired Skills

  • Other special requirements: CIPD Level 3

jobs.title: Admin Assistant
jobs.description:
Description: 
•	Opening up and setting up new administrative task projects
•	Identifying qualified clients according to established search criteria
•	Reading, replying, and sending out emails
•	Obtaining, reviewing, scoring and evaluating accuracy of collected data
•	Attending and participating in scheduled office meetings
•	Ensuring that member application forms are correctly completed
•	Entering new members in database
•	Scheduling tasks and events activities as required 
•	Performing online searches and downloading data as instructed
•	Performing other general office tasks as assigned
•	Conducting client surveys and completing questionnaires 
•	Perform task as assigned and trained by management based upon the needs of the business
Specification: 
•	Have excellent administration and organisational skills 
•	Possess good communication skills (written and verbal) with good grammar, spelling and punctuation
•	Have the ability to work proactively and manage work flows in a pressurised environment 
•	Be a decisive, self-motivated team player with a warm and personable nature 
•	Have visited the company website to familiarize yourself with its terms of business
•	Be capable of working on a self-management basis with little or no direct supervision
•	Good knowledge of office software and computer skills
•	3 A-Level degree or above is required

jobs.title: Admin Assistant
jobs.description:
**Job Description**

Nova Marketing Systems LTD is a business to business lead generation and appointment setting enterprise. 

As an **Admin Assistant**:
**Primary Responsibilities**
* Opening up and setting up new administrative task projects.
* Identifying qualified clients according to established search criteria.
* Reading, replying, and sending out emails.
* Obtaining, reviewing, scoring and evaluating accuracy of collected data.
* Attending and participating in scheduled office meetings.
* Ensuring that member application forms are correctly completed.
* Entering new members in database.
* Scheduling tasks and events activities as required
* Performing online searches and downloading data as instructed.
* Performing other general office tasks as assigned.
* Conducting client surveys and completing questionnaires.

**Secondary Responsibilities**
* Perform task as assigned and trained by management based upon the needs of the business.

**Person Specification**
* Have excellent administration and organisational skills
* Possess good communication skills (written and verbal) with good grammar, spelling and punctuation
* Have the ability to work proactively and manage work flows in a pressurised environment
* Be a decisive, self-motivated team player with a warm and personable nature
* Have visited the company website to familiarize yourself with its terms of business
* Be capable of working on a self-management basis with little or no direct supervision
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Job Description

Nova Marketing Systems LTD is a business to business lead generation and appointment setting enterprise.

As an Admin Assistant:
Primary Responsibilities

  • Opening up and setting up new administrative task projects.
  • Identifying qualified clients according to established search criteria.
  • Reading, replying, and sending out emails.
  • Obtaining, reviewing, scoring and evaluating accuracy of collected data.
  • Attending and participating in scheduled office meetings.
  • Ensuring that member application forms are correctly completed.
  • Entering new members in database.
  • Scheduling tasks and events activities as required
  • Performing online searches and downloading data as instructed.
  • Performing other general office tasks as assigned.
  • Conducting client surveys and completing questionnaires.

Secondary Responsibilities

  • Perform task as assigned and trained by management based upon the needs of the business.

Person Specification

  • Have excellent administration and organisational skills
  • Possess good communication skills (written and verbal) with good grammar, spelling and punctuation
  • Have the ability to work proactively and manage work flows in a pressurised environment
  • Be a decisive, self-motivated team player with a warm and personable nature
  • Have visited the company website to familiarize yourself with its terms of business
  • Be capable of working on a self-management basis with little or no direct supervision

jobs.title: Customer Service Advisor
jobs.description:
This full time role offers a competitive salary and a great working environment with standard hours of 9.00am-5.00pm (Monday-Friday). The ideal candidate must be capable of self-management and time keeping. The role of the Customer Service Advisor is to provide comprehensive, proactive and flexible support in all areas specified below. 

Key responsibilities include: 
-Ensuring that meetings and venues are appropriately prepare and suitable
-Placing ads online as well as in print for planned offers
-Answer calls from both London Metro and Evening Standard
-Conduct phone interviews, surveys or questionnaires as instructed
-Screen and question clients in order to ensure suitability for desired business opportunities 
-Meet with Delegates to complete contracting forms as required
-Booking Intelligent appointments saving time, energy and money
-Ensuring delegates are sent pre-attendance materials 
-Have all forms completed in a complete manner
-Accept course fee payments as required
-Answer questions without completing the sale
-Enter appropriate information in database system as required 
-Prepare Reports for analysis as required

SPECIFICATION

To be considered for this role, you should:
- Have excellent communication and selling skills (essential)
-Be capable of self-management and motivation with minimum supervision
-Have negotiation and persuasion skills (advantage)
-Demonstrate ability to deliver work to international standards
-CIPD level 3 accreditation in resourcing and talent management is required for this role.
-Possess good fluent communication skills
-Be able to work proactively and work well under pressure 
-Have visited the company’s website to understand it’s terms or business
-Be looking to further develop your career in customer service advisor sector and be able to properly follow assigned work plans


DISCLAIMER
Please accept our thanks for applying in advance. In the event that you do not receive a response from us within 2-4 weeks of your application, it would be safe to conclude that your application was not successful.  

https://novamarketingsystems.co.uk/about-nova

jobs.title: HR Consultant
jobs.description:
HR Consultant (HRC), Permant position
Location:  City of London EC2M Liverpool Street, London
Start date:          ASAP 
£27,000-£27,500 depending on education and experience
Vacation:           30 days 
Dress code:       Business casual to smart 
Hours FT/PT/contract:   9:00-5:00 workdays, FT local time, permanent contract.

The job duties/responsibilities of HR consultants often include:

Source, recruit and interview applicants on experience, skills, and education. 
    Lead and manage the companies main projects, taking them from design to delivery and evaluation.
    Ensure that the projects and client work is clearly planned, delivered to a high standard and meets the reporting needs of their funders.
Place adverts online, search for suitable employees for the company.

Review, and evaluate candidate CV’s, and conduct phone or video interviews.
    Undertaking Resourcing and Research for the development of the business,
    Delivering presentations to key Stakeholders,
    Write clear, structured project plans and create project documentation.
    Develop and deliver compelling content for a wide range of stakeholders.
    Collaborate effectively across the organisation and with partners, associates and clients and share outputs with the companies network.
 Make hiring recommendations to your department head as requited.
 Train junior staff as assigned.
 Represent employer in community and recruiting events. 


Essential 

Excellent organisational development, written and verbal communication skills with the ability to quickly assimilate complex information on a variety of topics.
Must be capable of self-management and motivation
Negotiation and persuasion skills are an advantage in this role
Minimum Education required for selection: 3 A Levels 
Demonstrated ability to deliver work to international standards 
Achieve CIPD certification before or during working.
